bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of lao zhai 勞瘵 , exhaustion consumption. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry sheng jiang 生 薑：近世方有主脾胃虛冷，不下食，積久羸弱成瘵者 , “Among the recipes used in recent times there are those which master depletion cold of the spleen and stomach, with an inability to eat, which, if continuing for an extended period of time, leads to emaciation weakness and generates consumption ”.

② Combined Designation of any disease or ailment, with a meaning identical with bing 病 , disease, and ji 疾 , ailment. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 preface: 伏羲氏作，因之而畫八卦，立庖 廚，滋味既興，痾瘵萌起 , “When Fu Xi acted he continued the [work of Sui Ren] and drew the eight trigrams. He established cuisines and all the delicious food emerged. [This] gave rise to all types of disease ”.
